page.title: 02A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: On Friday{I wake up}at seven thirty - five, get dressed at seven forty- five, have a cup of tea at eight o' clock. I have{breakfast}and at ten past eight I get washed. At eight- fifteen I let the{chickens}out of the coop and collect their eggs,then Ifeed {the horse.}At eight twenty- five I feed{the rabbits.}At eight-thirty I get ready for{school}and at eight- fifty I go to school. Between nine-thirty and three-thirty I am at school and this afternoon we go{swimming. At three forty- five I watch{T.V.}At five o' clock I have tea, five-thirty I watch T.V. At six-twenty I go to {Guides}and Guides ends at eight- thirty.At eight-forty I do{General {Knowledge.}At nine o- clock I watch T.V. At nine-thirty I go to bed and at ten-thirty,I go to sleep.
